variable: stay at home duration in days

stochastic_function: lambda stay_at_home_decision, income_in_usd, stay_at_home_duration_in_days: {-767.12: 1.0} if stay_at_home_decision == 'stay at home' and income_in_usd == 40000 and stay_at_home_duration_in_days == 7 else {-3835.62: 1.0} if stay_at_home_decision == 'stay at home' and income_in_usd == 40000 and stay_at_home_duration_in_days == 28 else {0: 1.0} if stay_at_home_decision == 'not stay at home' else {}
variable: cost of staying at home in usd
evidence: stay at home duration in days

stochastic_function: lambda stay_at_home_duration_in_days, population_infection_density, number_of_people_one_contacts: {'exposed': 1.0 - (1 - population_infection_density) ** (stay_at_home_duration_in_days * number_of_people_one_contacts), 'not exposed': (1 - population_infection_density) ** (stay_at_home_duration_in_days * number_of_people_one_contacts)}
evidence: stay at home duration in days

stochastic_function: lambda exposure: {'not infected': 0.99, 'mild': 0.008, 'severe': 0.00137, 'critical': 0.00045, 'dead': 0.000253485} if exposure == 'exposed' else {'not infected': 1.0, 'mild': 0.0, 'severe': 0.0, 'critical': 0.0, 'dead': 0.0}
lambda infection: {0: 1.0} if infection == 'not infected' else {14: 1.0} if infection == 'mild' else {31.5: 1.0} if infection in ['severe', 'critical'] else {35: 1.0} if infection == 'dead' else {}

lambda infection: {0: 1.0} if infection == 'not infected' or infection == 'mild' else {-12692: 1.0} if infection == 'severe' else {-34223: 1.0} if infection == 'critical' else {-88134: 1.0} if infection == 'dead' else {}

lambda infection, age, income_in_usd: {-1640000: 1.0} if infection == 'dead' and age == 38 and income_in_usd == 40000 else {-840000: 1.0} if infection == 'dead' and age == 58 and income_in_usd == 40000 else {0: 1.0}

lambda hospital_stays_in_days, income_in_usd: {-3835.62: 1.0} if hospital_stays_in_days == 35 and income_in_usd == 40000 else {-3452.05: 1.0} if hospital_stays_in_days == 31.5 and income_in_usd == 40000 else {-1534.25: 1.0} if hospital_stays_in_days == 14 and income_in_usd == 40000 else {0.0: 1.0} if hospital_stays_in_days == 0 else {}
